cookie-desc: By using this website, you automatically accept that we use cookies. What for?
index-about-paragraph-content: But I must explain to you how all this mistaken idea of denouncing pleasure and praising pain was born and I will give you a complete account of the system, and expound the actual teachings of the great explorer of the truth, the master-builder of human happiness. No one rejects, dislikes, or avoids pleasure itself, because it is pleasure, but because those who do not know how to pursue pleasure rationally encounter consequences that are extremely painful. Nor again is there anyone who loves or pursues or desires to obtain pain of itself, because it is pain, but because occasionally circumstances occur in which toil and pain can procure him some great pleasure. To take a trivial example, which of us ever undertakes laborious physical exercise, except to obtain some advantage from it? But who has any right to find fault with a man who chooses to enjoy a pleasure that has no annoying consequences, or one who avoids a pain that produces no resultant pleasure? On the other hand, we denounce with righteous indignation and dislike men who are so beguiled and demoralized by the charms of pleasure of the moment, so blinded by desire, that they cannot foresee

about-project-part1: CARIBA (Cancer Risk Behavior Assessment) is an innovative and comprehensive project on cancer prevention, created as part of the work of the Student Scientific Circle 'Oncos' of Opole University.
about-project-part2: It consists in examining behaviours that increase the risk of illness and conducting educational activities. The project in the pilot period is to be nationwide in nature
about-project-part3: It will eventually become an international project. The general objective of the project is to reduce the incidence of malignancies and to improve the early detection of cancer in the global population through:
about-list-item1: promoting knowledge of oncological prevention in an interactive, accessible and personalized way
about-list-item2: increase awareness of the available treatment methods and the effectiveness of modern oncological therapy
about-list-item3: analyses assessing knowledge of risk factors and cancer prevention in different cohorts of respondents
about-list-item4: to obtain a free, quick and individual cancer risk analysis with dedicated recommendations
